site_id.description: Site to turn sounds on, defaults to all sites.
site_id.name: Site ID

say.description: Sends a TTS message to Snips.

custom_data.description: Custom data that will be included with all messages in this session.
custom_data.name: Custom data

site_id.description: Site to use to start session, defaults to default.
site_id.name: Site ID

say.name: Say

say_action.description: Sends a TTS message to Snips to listen for a response.

can_be_enqueued.description: Whether the session should wait for an open session to end. Otherwise it is dropped if another session is already running.
can_be_enqueued.name: Can be enqueued

intent_filter.description: Optional Array of Strings - A list of intents names to restrict the NLU resolution to on the first query.
intent_filter.name: Intent filter

say_action.name: Say action
